information.title: What is the purpose of the AREA project?
information.description: The AREA project (Actions, Reactions, Automated Events) is a platform that allows users to create automations between different online services. Inspired by the "If This Then That" (IFTTT) concept, AREA offers a simple and intuitive way to connect your favorite applications and services to automate repetitive tasks.

actions.title: Actions
actions.description: Trigger events originating from a service. For example, receiving a new email or posting a new tweet.

reactions.title: Reactions
reactions.description: Tasks automatically executed in response to an action. For example, sending a notification or creating an event in a calendar.

customAutomation.title: Custom Automation
customAutomation.description: Create workflows tailored to your needs by combining different actions and reactions between multiple services.

information.whyUseAreaDescription: AREA simplifies your daily life by automating repetitive and time-consuming tasks. By centralizing interactions between your applications, you save time and improve your productivity.

examples.example1: Automatically post a message on Discord when you receive an important email.
examples.example2: Add a task to your task manager when you create a new file in Google Drive.
examples.example3: Receive a notification on your phone when the weather forecasts rain.

information.howToStartDescription: To get started with AREA, go to the AREA creation page and connect your favorite services. Configure your own automations in a few simple steps and let AREA take care of the rest!
